doc:
Richard Yearwood https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Yearwood 0 Richard Yearwood (born 22 June 1970) is a British-Canadian actor, voice actor, director and producer who is best known for providing the voice of Donkey Kong in Donkey Kong Country. Richard Yearwood had provided the voice of Rick from the Dino Crisis, and is also known for playing T-Bear from Blood Brothers. He also did the sounds for Rick in the Dino coliseum unlockable mini-game, but was uncredited. Richard_Yearwood ( born 22_June_1970 ) is a_British-Canadian_actor , voice_actor , director and producer who is_best_known for providing the_voice of Donkey_Kong in Donkey_Kong_Country . Richard_Yearwood had_provided the_voice of Rick from the_Dino_Crisis , and is_also_known for playing T-Bear from Blood_Brothers . He also did the_sounds for Rick in the_Dino_coliseum_unlockable_mini-game , but was uncredited .
